Name.description: Identifier used for the indicator, should not match any other identifier of an indicator used in the same catalog.

Title.description: Title used to describe the indicator

EodashIdentifier.description: Identifier that will be used within the eodash client

Description.description: Can be either a text string (allowing markdown) or relative path (which root is taken from the assets_endpoint configured for the catalog) to a markdown file (with .md extension)

Collections.description: List of collections that will be part of the indicator, have to match file names of collections configured in the collections folder (without the extension)

Disable.description: Optional list of collections (as defined in Collections) which should load as initially disabled in the dashboard layer control

BaseLayers.description: Optional overwrite of default base layer definition list

OverlayLayers.description: Optional overwrite of default overlay layer definition list

CollectionGroup.description: (Optional) identifier that can be used to group collections/indicators in eodash using the collection_group property for grouping in the configuration

name.description: recommended: Descriptive name to be shown on user interface

url.description: URL of service endpoint of data

Attribution.description: recommended: Text to be shown as attribution information for the layer, can include HTML elements

visible.description: defaults to true: for baselayers only one should be set to true, rest to false

protocol.description: protocol used for accessing the endpoint defined by url
